entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: adding a static field to a struct fails #108301
  • [9.0] Wasm build terminated with exit code 137 #108299
    9.0.0
  • [9.0] Assert: values differ in WebSocketServer_NoUserReadOrWrite_SendsPingAndReadsPongResponse #108298
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Obsolete XsltSettings.EnableScript #108287
  • [API Proposal]: Add TimeProvider to CreateLinkedTokenSource #108286
  • `HttpMetricsEnrichmentContext.AddCallback` seems to sometimes add duplicate tags #108284
  • [Profiler] Ability to call `DiagUpdateGenerationBounds()` from profiler API. #108276
  • System.Collections.Immutable aren't runnable with trimming #108274
  • [Profiler] Duplicate `GarbageCollectionFinished` notification #108273
  • [browser] `OnlyPredefinedCultures=true` does not throw an exception when culture is missing #108272
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on System.Threading.Tasks.ValueTaskPerfTest + 3 related #108291
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #108290
  • [MulticoreJIT] Single file deployment does not support ProfileOptimization #108270
  • [illink][ios] Explicitly setting `PublishTrimmed=true` changes the default feature switch configuration #108269
    10.0.0
  • Guid.CreateVersion7 is to slow for my use case, maybe a Version8 could be introduced. #108268
  • Guid.Version does not return correct version in all situations #108267
  • Logging source generator: CS9107 ILogger parameter is captured when use ILogger without generic #108264
    10.0.0
  • HostModel does not reference the version of System.Text.Json that it runs on in the SDK #108262

Closed

  • [cdac] don't use EmbeddedResource in cdac-build-tool #107958
    10.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors Should omit `.Reshape` function. #106539
    9.0.0
  • Local build of runtime failing when running CDac tool #107936
    10.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Text.Json, Version=10.0.0.0 #108261
    10.0.0
  • Connecting to IPAddress.Any via HTTP/3 #108259
  • Error when deserializing using system-text-json polymorphism #107595
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity.SetStatus should also set the OpenTelemetry tag #108260
    Future
  • createdump fails on RHEL 8/arm64 with "stack smashing detected" #108023
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert `ReflectionInvocation.CanValueSpecialCast()` to managed #108305
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • [PERF] Pass ScenarioArgs for scenario performance tests #108303
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unblock System.Linq testing in nativeAOT outerloop #108302
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/9.0] [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108296
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #108294
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108283
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #108282
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, 9.0.0
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Change ICU `WasmBuildTests` to use `wasmconsole` and `wasmbrowser` templates #108271
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Root the System.Runtime EventSource #108266
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Merged

  • Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108246
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Disable System.Collections.Immutable tests on native AOT #108275
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac-build-tool] don't embed resources #108293
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac][tests] Make it easier to set up a unit test #108288
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cdac][cdac-build-tool] Don't let msbuild rewrite the resource name #108289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #107592
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #107591
    Servicing-approved, linkable-framework, area-codeflow
  • [mini] Don't use Unwind Backtrace on android-amd64 #107615
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/9.0] More doc updates for source-of-truth assemblies #108257
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #108006
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 9.0.0
  • Remove live System.Text.Json reference from HostModel #108263
    area-HostModel
  • Add test coverage for DirectoryServices.TransformControls #107201
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fixing SetSlice, Reshape, TryCopyTo. #107852
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Bring back Microsoft.BCL.Memory netstandard2.1 facade #108245
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64: Fix lsra for AdvSimd_LoadAndInsertScalar #107786
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete dead code #108265
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • [cdac] break up cdacreader into 4 separate assemblies #108156
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Reduce funceval abort #108256
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough checks in Compiler::TryLowerSwitchToBitTest #108106
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Update sign-diagnostic-files.yml to skip dac sign in staging #108244
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • MSFT:53847109 [.NET Core] DTS / UserPrincipal.GetAuthorizationGroups returns PrincipalOperationException: Information about the domain could not be retrieved (1212). #108032
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add runtime check for unwind get_proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WASI] sockets #106977
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Sockets, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] HTTP client testing #105838
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, os-wasi
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [browser] Increase timeout and clean up after failed attempts of launching browser when testing #107865
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • [iOS] Enable and disable tests for hybrid globalization on Apple #108187
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] disable debugger tests on CI #108178
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix handling of appending keywords to boolean schemas. #108248
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Unify linking file composition for wasi and wasm. #107547
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, blocked, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Fix IDynamicInterfaceCastable with shared generic code #108235
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add fuzzer for Convert.To/FromBase64 APIs #108247
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Support for devirtualizing array interface methods #108153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-rc.2.24474.11] paint.netcore build with errors about elements from Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET are not found #43707
  • Conflict between "pt-BR" and "pt-br" folders when publishing an ASP.NET application in Docker on Linux #43701

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E] With 9.0.100-rc.2.24429.8 SDK exe installed, "Warning: Workload garbage collection failed with error: Failed to get global.json GC roots Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key')" is shown after installing wasm-tools workload. #43114
  • Typo in german installer #43725
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 RC2 creating 8.0/6.0 project requires October Servicing (8.0.10/6.0.35) feeds. #43465

PullRequests

Created

  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix typos #43730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #43721
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid reading manifest for hash #43710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid reading the manifest as part of the Build #43722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Remove multiple file accesses per asset #43724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid generating dependent manifests if original manifest is up to date #43709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Switch to source generated System.Text.Json #43711
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Avoid running packing logic when project is not packable #43708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43677
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Always disable NuGet auditing in source-only build #43696
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] BinSkim: Enable CFG #43695
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, Area-Workloads
  • Multi arch containers #43085
    Area-Containers
  • Join assets from verticals in the final join point #43627
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Fix parsing and error reporting of ports that lack port type metadata #43551
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2547068 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn code generator referenced via a package flow is just convoluted #75268
    Backlog
  • EnC tests produce different results when using Windows and Portable PDB #75262

Closed

  • No completion for constructor parameter type when attribute is present #73120
    Backlog
  • IDE0304 should preserve the leading comment #74208
    Backlog
  • IDE0290 code fix is invalid in `ref struct` #73614
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio Auto Complete Error with Collection Expressions #72872
    Backlog
  • IDE0028/IDE0300 is not reported for overloaded methods #73362
    Backlog
  • Refactoring IDE0053 with preprocessor directives breaks compilation #74137
    Backlog
  • Exception in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.UseCollectionInitializer.CSharpUseCollectionInitializerDiagnosticAnalyzer #75214
  • NullRef in GenerateVariable.CSharpGenerateVariableCodeFixProvider.GetCodeActionsAsync #75204
    Backlog
  • WarningsAsErrors is not working #75198
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35325.131 #75248
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35325.230 #75247

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect more fluent cases for converting collection expressions #75267
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • update configs for snap #75263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add support for inlining declarations in top level code #75258
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: Allow reordering members #75257
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix crash when converting properties to methods #75256
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Fix issue simplifying name in speculative context #75255
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix crash in encapsulate field with primary constructors #75254
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • docs: Fix in Contributing-Code.md .NET code formatter tool url #75253
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Do not load CodeStyle analyzers added by the SDK #75250
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix completion lists in primary constructor parameter lists #75266
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add telemetry to track the rename option used. #75269
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Preserve comment when converting to collection expression #75259
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prevent IDE0290 (convert to primary constructor) in ref struct #73869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, 17.12 P3
  • Short term field keyword nullable analysis #75246
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add test demonstrating a scenario now works #75265
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support converting to collection expression when overloads would not change #75264
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable use-expression-body for lambdas with PP directives in them #75261
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P3
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75251
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.12 P3
  • Updates content exclusion for on-the-fly-docs #75172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P3
  • Upgrade xUnit #75068
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode, 17.12 P3

Updated

  • Use manual recursion for binary patterns #75212
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix leading comments not being preserved on variable case #74278
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, 17.12
  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move Quick Info content production to the Features layer and add Razor EA co-hosting APIs for Hover and Completion #75226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • EnC: allow changing accessibility of members #75191
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Stabilize lsp workspace diagnostic test #74090
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Get and GetOrdered to EndpointMetadataCollection #58110
  • Quarantine CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_LogFile #58108
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #58106
  • `ValidateOnStartup` does not work when using `WebHost.CreateDefaultBuilder` #58100
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #58099
  • Perf improvement: caching, multiple_queries #58098
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, multiple_queries, plaintext_spring #58097
  • Empty catch-all routes not working as expected #58093
  • Blazor Identity Account/RegistrationConfirmation Wrong Tutorial Link #58092
  • Blazor JS interop (server side render). Calling InvokeJsAsync does not throw if connection lost #58089
  • Add `Http2AndHttp3` to `HttpProtocols` to explicitly disable HTTP/1.x in Kestrel #58088
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58086

Closed

  • OpenAPI document generation does not generate correct refs for self-referencing collection properties #58006
    9.0.0
  • OpenApi inline enum for query parameters #57979
    9.0.0
  • UnmappedMemberHandling not working with Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi #57981
    9.0.0
  • Announcement: Swashbuckle.AspNetCore is being removed in .NET 9 #54599
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: json #58038
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58054
  • Using a Blazor application and Firefox, upon closing the window/application, CircuitHandler OnCircuitClosedAsync is not called. #57996
  • Disabling Prerendering + Session Affinity does not work #58079
  • Blazor WebAssembly uses the AuthorizationMessageHandler exception #57956

PullRequests

Created

  • Test new nuget restore feature #58111
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_LogFile #58109
    area-networking
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #58107
    area-networking
  • Re-quarantine OrderedGroupMetadataForControllers #58105
    area-mvc
  • Quarantine POST_ClientCancellationBidirectional_RequestAbortRaised #58104
    area-networking
  • Add additional ProblemDetails default types and titles #58101
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add registry search for upgrade policy keys #58095
    area-infrastructure
  • Explain msquic limitations in Http3SampleApp #58094
    area-networking
  • Quarantine Http1Connection_ServerAbort_HasErrorType #58087
    area-networking

Merged

  • Fix up OpenAPI schema handling and support concurrent requests (#58024) #58096
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #58065
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [release/9.0] Mark API from 9 as shipped #58060
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0.0
  • Disable automated inter-branch merges #58061
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57812
    area-networking, 6.0.x
  • [Backport] Http.Sys: Clean up Request parsing errors #57819
    area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57967
    Servicing-consider, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal, feature-rdf
  • [TEST] Upload windows event logs #57923
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Using Interlocked in InputFlowControl and Http2Stream #57968
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid generic instantiation #24951
  • Labels disappear on Windows when switching theme #24950
  • TemplatedView and TemplateBinding not working anymore in NET9 #24949
  • [net9.0, iOS, Xharness] Xharness keeps freezing up on net9.0 branch #24942
    Backlog
  • High crash rate: 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.Compatibility.ShellPageRendererTracker+TitleViewContainer' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument. #24938

Closed

  • Workload sets don't seem to work for pinning a MAUI version (in DevOps) #24940
  • .net8 maui ios app crashing on startup on actual device #24932
  • [Android] ImageButton CornerRadius has nothing to do with Xamarin.Forms CornerRadius #24939
  • Grouped CollectionView content/items overlaps on iOS when data changes or when pull to refresh data #20336
    Backlog
  • CollectionView with grouping show duplicates groups or crash when adding/removing data on iOS and MacCatalyst #17969
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Maui app is not built into any iOS device #24937

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0 Merge main to net9.0 #24953
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers (attempt 2) #24952
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948

Merged

    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Localization] Change OneLoc branch to 'lego' #24946
    area-localization
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨

Updated

  • [macios] Bump .NET 8 to support Xcode 16.0 #24833
  • [ci] Build with arcade #24625
    area-infrastructure
  • [UITesting] Moved ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to Appium #24934
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [Android] CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Fix DataTrigger behavior that can cause some strange inconsistencies #15655
    area-xaml, community ✨, stale
  • [XC] Add feature switch to enable compiling bindings with source #24924
    area-xaml, 9.0-rc2
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] IndicatorView with DataTemplate (custom image) does not render correctly when ItemsSource change #24717
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
    area-blazor
  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • AppThemeBinding on ToolbarItems #24886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-menubar
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683

  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator hidden behind header in CollectionView - fix #20824

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations assembly is not used #34772
    9.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.Core TFMs #34771
    10.0.0
  • Support new LINQ methods #34767
  • Intercept resolution of entity type #34765
  • Abstract base type for IMaterializationInterceptor, possibly other interceptor interfaces #34764
  • Complex property defined in base abstract class not being mapped in TPC #34763
  • Wrong blob data returned in select statement #34762
  • SQLite Error 19: 'FOREIGN KEY constraint failed'. exception is thrown in case of foreign key constraint is configured in base class's EntityTypeConfiguration #34761
  • `NullReferenceException` for a custom `ValueConverter` in EF Core 9 RC 1. #34760
  • Context not discovered from the service provider #34758
    9.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild dependency #34757
